html5 css grid of 3x3 cells of 3:2 ratio with thumbnail sample image from https://picsum.photos/300/200 and dropdown menu above that has 23 selections listed as "channel" + the selection number. Making a new selection clears the image cache and loads a new image from https://picsum.photos/300/200
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
